title: Slovenia Unveils the Mystical Kurentovanje 2026: Experience the Wild Carnival of Masks, Folklore, and Ancient Traditions in the Heart of Ptuj!

title: Before the Bidet: The Gritty, Wild History of Ancient Japanese Toilets
description: Before 21st-century Japanese smart toilets with built-in bidets, seat warmers and the Otohime flushing sound effect for drowning out the natural bathroom noises of shy privy users, there was the kawaya. Literally meaning “river house” or “side house,” it was a structure built over a river or an irrigated ditch that acted as a simple [...]The post Before the Bidet: The Gritty, Wild History of Ancient Japanese Toilets appeared first on Tokyo Weekender.

title: Ed Miliband's energy department HQ 'is powered by fossil fuels'
description: Several government departments and agencies, including the Miliband's Department for Energy Security and Net Zero, have been favouring cheaper 'brown' energy tariffs over 'green' energy.

title: Hundreds wade into an ancient lake for traditional Bakong fishing ritual
